step1.para: Place the vehicle frame on a jack, then raise it enough to relieve the load from the leaf spring assemblies (Item 27). Remove the wheels from the vehicle. Block the axles to restrict movement.
Reyco 101A: Remove the torque arm bolts (Items 18 and 33) from the spring brackets and axle seats to release the torque rods (Items 35 and 37).
Reyco 102 and 102W: Remove the torque arm bolts (Items 18 and 33) from the brackets and axle seats to release the torque rods (Items 36 and 37).
Remove the U-bolt nuts and washers (Items 31 and 32), U-bolts (Item 24) and the U-bolt plates (Item 30).
Remove the shoulder bolts from the front and rear spring brackets (Items 7 and 20) and the equalizer mounting bracket (Item 9).
Remove the leaf spring assemblies (Item 27) from the suspension.
